name: tralalerocontracts-app
description: Create magic contracts like a kid's game

scripts.build: node pre-deploy-check.js && echo 'Build completed - all systems ready'
scripts.setup: npm install && echo 'Setup completed. Note: Rust/Cargo required for smart contract compilation'
scripts.deploy-prep: npm run clean && npm run pre-deploy
scripts.render-ready: npm run clean && npm run verify-render

author: Gemini
